about_the_game:
A fleet is ready to serve you, and you are about to step into this vast galaxy divided by heroes, full of opportunities and challenges. You will fight to the death with interstellar pirates, experience the love and hatred between various forces in the universe, carry out trade, expand the fleet, and explore the truth and treasures lost in the universe. As you accumulate wealth, military power, and political connections, you will gradually gain the ability to influence the affairs of the universe...

Diverse adventure journey

What awaits you after entering the game is a huge stage called the Galaxy, where you can create your legend in any way you like. You can join a force and establish great military exploits in the conflict with its old enemy; you can become a merchant, travel among the bright stars, and make a lot of money with your business acumen; you can also join forces to win over a group of lords. Build your own intergalactic force with their support. Your gaming experience will depend entirely on your choices.

Build an invincible fleet

You can design your own ships and build your own unique fleet according to your preferences. Collect frightening legendary weapons through trade, archaeology, war, etc., and use them to arm you and your warships, making your fleet an indestructible force in the universe.

Gorgeous barrage performance

The battlefield across countless astronomical units in the universe makes all battles a gorgeous barrage performance. You can rely on your superb skills to move gracefully through the hail of bullets, or you can rely on well-armed ships to dominate and ignore everything. You're at the center of the show, so dance the show any way you like.

Every game is a new adventure

With randomly generated maps and randomly triggered events, the universe situation in each round will be completely different from the previous one. You need to choose your strategy carefully to cope with the ever-changing landscape.

  • Graphics: Support Vulkan

short_description: In this sci-fi sandbox strategy game, lead your newly formed fleet to explore the vast galaxy, serve with an interstellar force, or claim your place in the universe. War, trade, politics, you will face conflicts between cosmic forces and crises that threaten the entire galaxy.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, French*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
